      • get_cfs_sblock

        LocalOrRemoteBlock get_cfs_sblock(java.lang.String caller_host_name,
                                java.nio.ByteBuffer block_id,
                                java.nio.ByteBuffer sblock_id,
                                int offset,
                                java.lang.String keyspace,
                                org.apache.cassandra.thrift.ConsistencyLevel consistency_level)
                                  throws org.apache.cassandra.thrift.InvalidRequestException,
                                         org.apache.cassandra.thrift.UnavailableException,
                                         org.apache.cassandra.thrift.TimedOutException,
                                         org.apache.cassandra.thrift.NotFoundException,
                                         org.apache.thrift.TException
        Returns a local or remote sub block. A remote sub block is the expected binary sub block data A local sub block is the file, offset and length for the calling application to read This is a great optimization because it avoids any actual data transfer.
        Parameters:
        caller_host_name -
        block_id -
        sblock_id -
        offset -
        keyspace -
        consistency_level -
        Throws:
        org.apache.cassandra.thrift.InvalidRequestException
        org.apache.cassandra.thrift.UnavailableException
        org.apache.cassandra.thrift.TimedOutException
        org.apache.cassandra.thrift.NotFoundException
        org.apache.thrift.TException

      • get_remote_cfs_sblock

        LocalOrRemoteBlock get_remote_cfs_sblock(java.nio.ByteBuffer block_id,
                                       java.nio.ByteBuffer sblock_id,
                                       int offset,
                                       java.lang.String keyspace,
                                       org.apache.cassandra.thrift.ConsistencyLevel consistency_level)
                                         throws org.apache.cassandra.thrift.InvalidRequestException,
                                                org.apache.cassandra.thrift.UnavailableException,
                                                org.apache.cassandra.thrift.TimedOutException,
                                                org.apache.cassandra.thrift.NotFoundException,
                                                org.apache.thrift.TException
        Returns a CFS sub block by copying it using thrift. Use it only if get_cfs_sblock fails e.g. due to permission problems.
        Parameters:
        block_id -
        sblock_id -
        offset -
        keyspace -
        consistency_level -
        Throws:
        org.apache.cassandra.thrift.InvalidRequestException
        org.apache.cassandra.thrift.UnavailableException
        org.apache.cassandra.thrift.TimedOutException
        org.apache.cassandra.thrift.NotFoundException
        org.apache.thrift.TException
